康乾盛世.definition: booming and golden age of Qing dynasty (from Kang Xi to Qian Long emperors)

康保.definition: Kangbao county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

康保縣.definition: Kangbao county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

康區.definition: former Tibetan province of Kham, now split between Tibet and Sichuan

康多莉扎·賴斯.pinyin: Kang1 duo1 li4 zha1 · Lai4 si1
康多莉扎·賴斯.definition: Condoleezza Rice (1954-), US Secretary of State 2005-2009

康巴.definition: Khampa, subdivision of Tibetan ethnic group; former Tibetan province of Kham, now split between Tibet and Sichuan

康巴地區.definition: former Tibetan province of Kham, now split between Tibet and Sichuan

康巴藏區.definition: former Kham province of Tibet, now split between Tibet and Sichuan

康平縣.definition: Kangping county in Shenyang 瀋陽|沈阳, Liaoning

康廣仁.definition: Kang Guangren (1867-1898), younger brother of Kang Youwei 康有為|康有为[Kang1 You3 wei2] and one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs 戊戌六君子 of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898

康復.definition: to recuperate; to recover (health); to convalesce

康托爾.definition: Cantor (name); Georg Cantor (1845-1918), German mathematician, founder of set theory

康有為.definition: Kang Youwei (1858-1927), Confucian intellectual, educator and would-be reformer, main leader of the failed reform movement of 1898

康樂.definition: peace and happiness (old); healthy and happy; recreation

康樂縣.definition: Kangle County in Linxia Hui Autonomous Prefecture 臨夏回族自治州|临夏回族自治州[Lin2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu

康橋.definition: Cambridge (city), from a poem by Xu Zhimo 徐志摩

康熙.definition: Kangxi, title of the reign (1661-1722) of the Kangxi Emperor 聖祖|圣祖[Sheng4 zu3]

康熙字典.definition: the Kangxi Dictionary, named after the Kangxi Emperor, who in 1710 ordered its compilation, containing 47,035 single-character entries

康生.definition: Kang Sheng (1896-1975), Chinese communist leader, a politburo member during the Cultural Revolution and posthumously blamed for some of its excesses

康科德.definition: Concord (place name); Concord, capital of US state New Hampshire

康縣.definition: Kang county in Longnan 隴南|陇南[Long3 nan2], Gansu

康莊大道.definition: broad and open road (idiom); fig. brilliant future prospects

康馬.definition: Kangmar county, Tibetan: Khang dmar rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

康馬縣.definition: Kangmar county, Tibetan: Khang dmar rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet
